frontMatter.title: Team Structure
frontMatter.metaDescription: Defines key roles, job responsibilities, boundaries, and values of the team. Everyone should understand who does what and their purpose in the team.

checklist.question: Have you identified different roles and skills required for the team?
checklist.expectation: Able to show list of roles covering major aspects of product eng. and under each skillset, list of roles from Product Mgt. to DevOps

checklist.question: Have you identified a communication and escalation plan?
checklist.expectation: By way of documentation and able to illustrate how communication should take place from requirement gathering to escalating risks and plans.

checklist.question: Have you identified a set of KPIs for members playing in specified roles?
checklist.expectation: Defined KPI which has been communicated to team members
